title: Mobile Microlearning Course Based on Foreign Literature Discussions

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English reading comprehension and no literary analysis experience
context.additional_context: Asynchronous discussion activities using digital devices combined with twice-weekly live video sessions

learning_goals: Learners can enhance critical reading skills considering cultural contexts by analyzing three American short stories.
Learners can develop the ability to express their opinions with logical reasoning through discussion-based learning activities.
Learners can acquire the ability to evaluate literary themes from multiple perspectives through mock trials and debate-style discussions.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
